name: Leaderman
overview: A platform game reminiscent of Lode Runner in design. Control your man to collect all the fruit on the level. Avoid the bandits as they can kill you. When you have collected all the fruit you can enter the green door (Marked E). Once you have entered the door a whole new level will be granted to you. Leaderman was created by Roland Kunz and released by BB Software in 1983.
